Control Name: 4.13.5 A health model has been defined based on performance, availability, and recovery targets and is represented through monitoring dashboard and alerts.
Control Statement: Has a health model been defined to qualify what 'healthy' and 'unhealthy' states represent across all application components, in a measurable and observable format? and is this health model fully represented through monitoring dashboards and alerts?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.13 How do you monitor and measure application health?
control_attributes.Control: 4.13.5 A health model has been defined based on performance, availability, and recovery targets and is represented through monitoring dashboard and alerts.
control_attributes.Description: Has a health model been defined to qualify what 'healthy' and 'unhealthy' states represent across all application components, in a measurable and observable format? and is this health model fully represented through monitoring dashboards and alerts?
